row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.STORE", "FILESYSTEM", C, N :SET &FILE_TOOL_JAR# = STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#, "file-system-tool.jar")
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FILE_BASE_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_FILE_BASE_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Base Directory" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_BASE_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Search For" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_SEARCH# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Exclude" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_EXCLUDE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Type" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_TYPE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Detail Output" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_OUTPUT# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Recursive" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_RECURSIVE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Ignore Case" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_IGNORE_CASE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Fail if missing" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FAIL_IF_MISSING#
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&FILE_TOOL_JAR#" file FileFind -d "&UC4RB_FILE_BASE_DIR#" ? -s "&UC4RB_FILE_SEARCH#" -e "&UC4RB_FILE_EXCLUDE#" -t &UC4RB_FILE_TYPE# ? -do &UC4RB_FILE_OUTPUT# -r &UC4RB_FILE_RECURSIVE# -ic &UC4RB_IGNORE_CASE# -fe &UC4RB_FAIL_IF_MISSING# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
